guidedPaths.label: Using Oracle Cloud Compute Service (IaaS)
guidedPaths.shortDesc: An enterprise grade infrastructure service that provides a rapidly provisioned virtual compute environment to easily migrate workloads and run them at scale with predictable, consistent performance, control and visibility.
guidedPaths.imageLink: public link to image from DOCCS

guidedPaths.label: Oracle Storage Compute Service
guidedPaths.shortDesc: Enterprise-proven public cloud storage and archive service that supports your need for cloud-based data storage, sharing, and protection. Secure, resilient, elastic, and simple to use so your data is available when you need it from any environment connected to the Internet.
guidedPaths.imageLink: public link to image from DOCCS

guidedPaths.label: Setting Up VPN Using a Third-Party VPN Device
guidedPaths.shortDesc: Oracle Network Cloud Service offers Site-to-Site VPN for Dedicated Compute customers and FastConnect for all Oracle Cloud customers. Site-to-Site VPN securely extends your on-premises network to your dedicated Oracle Compute zone. FastConnect provides a high bandwidth connection between your data center and Oracle Cloud services.
guidedPaths.imageLink: public link to image from DOCCS
